str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To disturb, agitate, stir up, trouble. Of uncertain affinity; to stir or agitate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
